thread.title: Fan with historic Brady ball returns it
thread.title_full: Fan with historic Brady ball returns it

title: Fan with historic Brady ball returns it
text:
Fan with historic Brady ball returns it Patriots QB meets with fan Wednesday POSTED: 05:02 PM MDT Sep 30, 2015 
Tom Brady became just the fourth quarterback to throw 400 touchdown passes on Sunday. Related Content Jordan Spieth sets prize money record 
Brady hit wide receiver Danny Amendola with a 1-yard TD pass with 18 seconds left in the first half to join Peyton Manning, Brett Favre and Dan Marino as the only players to pass for 400 regular-season touchdowns. 
A lifelong fan agreed to return the ball to the NFL star. David Bowen got to meet the quarterback at Gillette Stadium Wednesday, the Boston Herald reported. 
Bowen told the paper he has had season tickets since 1985. After he was presented with the ball, a ball boy asked if he'd be willing to switch it for another game ball, the Herald reported. 
"I said, 'Sure, no problem,' and they just gave me another one," Bowen told the paper. 
Brady's "400 ball" is on display in The Hall at Patriot Place, the Herald said.
